sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
General catalogue of all the stitch'd books and single sheets &c. printed the two last years, commencing from the first discovery of the Popish Plot (September, 1678) and continued to Michaelmas term, 1680.
[3], 32, 22 [i.e. 24], 16 p.
[Printed by] J. R. ..., London : 1680.
Parts II and III each has special t.p. and separate pagination. Advertisement: p. [1]. Errors in paging: p. 7-8 in second part duplicated in the numbering. Reproduction of original in the Union Theaological Seminary Library.
=======
General catalogue of all the stitch'd books and single sheets &c. printed the two last years, commencing from the first discovery of the Popish Plot (September, 1678) and continued to Michaelmas term, 1680.
[3], 32, 22 [i.e. 24], 16 p.
[Printed by] J. R. ..., London : 1680.
Parts II and III each has special t.p. and separate pagination. Advertisement: p. [1]. Errors in paging: p. 7-8 in second part duplicated in the numbering. Reproduction of original in the Union Theaological Seminary Library.
] J. R.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
